column4: im runing a ubuntu based distro..if i install the ubuntu-desktop package.....is it still the distro i installed or ubuntu
if u installed xubuntu and will install Ubuntu-Desktop then then u will have ubuntu.. Then if u install Xubuntu-Desktop you wont have Ubuntu youll get Xubungu
ouh... then i think you will everything what is installed and Ubuntu
it would still be the ultimate edition then plus the ubuntu desktop
